__e: She claims it's just a head cold. I hope to heaven that's all it is.
It looks like everyone in town has caught a Christmas Cold overnight.
I've had this head cold for the last three days, and it's killing me. You got a cold?
She had a cold, and then it wasn't a cold.
I died of a cold gone bad, and you died by your own hand.
Tell your mother I'm coming down with a cold and that I have to go to bed.
And to think that for 3 years I thought I had hay-fever!
I got hayfever for the first time in my life this summer.
Then I had to go to the country to visit Aunt Augusta and when I got back, I had poison ivy and you had Tom.
